item.title: Hello World on Android
item.description: Motivation I wanted to get my environment ready for Android development. It was pretty straightforward on the Mac, I can see it being more of a headache on other platforms. Procedure Firstly, download Android Studio. It is pretty amazing that they’ve wrapped everything you need in a free IDE. There’s a ton of shit for Java projects that I’d rather not think about. I’m using this training course. Open it in another tab.
